title: Direct Mail Blueprint - The Secrets of Direct Mail Millionaires
description:
Direct Mail Blueprint
The Secrets of Direct Mail Millionaires
"Offline Marketing for Online Marketers"

"Why Does A Successful 'Six Figure a Month' Online Marketer Insist That His Offline Marketing Strategies Are Responsible For His Continued Success!"
Your Online Business Can Literally Explode With These Little known Offline Marketing Secrets
Direct Mail Can Double And Even Triple Your Online Marketing Profit!
Learn Just How Easy It Is To Get Started!

Internet Marketer and Master Direct Mail Marketer John Alanis has come forth and shared with his pioneering strategies that merge the online and offline world.
Here is what is included in the course:

Direct Mail Primer Course (3) Modules, Fast Start Flash Presentation, Direct Mail Main Course (10) Modules, Fast Start Guide, Direct Mail Manual, Direct Mail Course Transcripts, Direct Mail Master Resource Directory
- John's Personal Roledex

These Strategies have produced Millions of dollars in revenue that would have otherwise gone uncollected.

In This Course You Will Learn...
- How to get started for very low cost
- How to find the best buyers lists to fit your niche market
- How to create your offline marketing material
- How to avoid extremely costly mistakes
- Learn about the differences between the buying habits of online buyers and offline buyers
- How to find offline buyers and convert them to online buyers and vise versa
- How to setup your first offline campaign
- The best way to add Offline Order Forms to your Online business

Learn how you can easily outsource tasks such as:

- Live Phone Order Taking
- Finding and Using the Right Mail House
- Finding and Using the Right Printer Services
- Finding and Using the best Fulfillment Companies

- How to Convert a Digital Product into a Physical Product
- Why physical products have a greater stick rate and more perceived value
- Learn the many ways that you can give your customers to buy from you
- Learn the best type,color, and size of mailers that get the best results
- Why Direct Mail can be so inexpensive yet profitable that you can't afford not to add it to your business
- Learn about how to use bounce back offers in all the products that you ship
- Learn about the difference between ugly and pretty products and the buyers perception
- How to keep your fulfillment costs low
- Where to find small run printers and physical product duplicators

- Learn about offline forced continuity programs that will bring in a ton of money each and every month
- Learn from John as he walks you through his own direct mail business business model step by step
- Learn about a response technique that generated a 400% better response offline than online
- Learn how to create powerful offline "First Call To Action" marketing materials
- Learn why offline marketing results are far more stable than online marketing
- Learn how to shortcut your efforts by knowing what online marketing data to use in your offline efforts
- Learn the difference in results between first class and bulk mail
- Learn how to quickly develop rapport with your customers and setup the next sale
- Learn why direct mail gets more mind share and face time with your prospects and how to leverage it to quickly grow revenue
- Learn how to quickly and easily transition to larger transactions offline

And Much Much More..
